mapper.insert: INSERT INTO et_pet ( user_id, name, species, breed, age, gender, is_neutered, activity_level, weight ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{name}, #{species}, #{breed}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{isNeutered}, #{activityLevel}, #{weight} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM et_pet WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND deleted_at IS NULL ORDER BY pet_id DESC
SELECT * FROM et_pet WHERE pet_id = #{petId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE et_pet SET name = #{name}, species = #{species}, breed = #{breed}, age = #{age}, gender = #{gender}, is_neutered = #{isNeutered}, activity_level = #{activityLevel}, weight = #{weight} WHERE pet_id = #{petId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
UPDATE et_pet SET deleted_at = NOW() WHERE pet_id = #{petId} AND deleted_at IS NULL
